thothbot.parallax.core.client.textures
Class Texture

java.lang.Object
  thothbot.parallax.core.client.textures.Texture
Direct Known Subclasses:
CubeTexture, DataTexture, RenderTargetTexture
public class Texture
extends java.lang.Object

Basic implementation of texture.

This code based on three.js code.

Author:
thothbot

Texture

public Texture(com.google.gwt.dom.client.Element image,
               Texture.MAPPING_MODE mapping,
               TextureWrapMode wrapS,
               TextureWrapMode wrapT,
               TextureMagFilter magFilter,
               TextureMinFilter minFilter,
               PixelFormat format,
               DataType type)
Constructor will create a texture instance.

Parameters:
image - the media element
mapping - the @{link Texture.MAPPING_MODE} value
wrapS - the wrap parameter for texture coordinate S. @see TextureWrapMode.
wrapT - the wrap parameter for texture coordinate T. @see TextureWrapMode.
magFilter - the texture magnification function. @see TextureMagFilter.
minFilter - the texture minifying function. @see TextureMinFilter.
format - the PixelFormat value.
type - the DataType value.
